text: [[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Fires a volley of arrows in an area[[/col]]
[[col:red]][[img:icon_arrow_down]][[/img]] Spends unit ammo for each volley[[/col]]
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Target and caster are forced to fight each other[[/col]]
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Increased rage gain when in combat[[/col]]
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Affected units gain bonus armour but have reduced speed[[/col]]
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Fires volleys of arrows at an area[[/col]]
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Lowers the stats of the unit engaged in combat[[/col]]
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] The unit places their shields on their backs and uses their spear two-handed, gaining increased attack and movement but lower defence.[[/col]]
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Gain more rage out of combat[[/col]]
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Replenishes hit points of targeted friendly units[[/col]]
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Forces the target to attack the taunter[[/col]]
